Bring back Item Sets, and maybe allow champion selection of mastery pages like you could with items. Maybe including a selectable diagram or your role in norms, so the game can accurately discern your location for things like rating for champs played in off roles like support or jungle, and to get rid of the constant whining over who called what first. Something like the ranked display of location that you can mouse over and pick your role.
Agreed, need our Item Sets back please!
